title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not displayed when dataset is not set
description: The group dialog is not being displayed when attempting to create a new table group without setting a dataset.
OB: When adding a table report item without setting a dataset and trying to create a new table group, the group dialog does not appear. Users are unable to define a group when the dataset is not defined.
EB: The group dialog should be displayed even when the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group without specifying a dataset.
SR:
1. Open the application and create a new project.
2. Add a table report item to the project.
3. Do not set a dataset for the table report item.
4. Attempt to create a new table group.
5. Observe that the group dialog is not displayed.
6. Expected behavior: The group dialog should appear, allowing users to define a group even when the dataset is not defined.
